website_summaries.verdict: Popular short throw projector that includes full HD projection with a bright video signal.
pros: Offers a projection size of up to 250 inches at 24 feet
Excellent lumens rating of 3,200 along with a 1080p HD resolution signal that works well for movies and games
Contrast ratio is well above average at 22,000-to-1
Fast setup time for a home theater projector
Reasonably good audio quality with a 10-watt speaker
cons: Minimum throw ratio of 1.15, which may not work well in a very small room

customer_reviews.title: Not Short Throw, description is wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great with this love the brightness, but the description is incorrect. Super Sized Movies and Games With a ***short throw lens***, this projector delivers huge images in modest-sized rooms. So whether you’re a movie buff or a casual gamer, this projector lets you go big at home. I have compared to my Optoma GT1080 Short Throw Gaming Projector which can do 111" screen at 4 feet. The ViewSonic 110" at 12-Feet. If you want a true short throw don't buy this one. If you don't care about the short throw then this projector is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Helpful

customer_reviews.title: If you need to adjust the picture to fit your screen, Beware!
customer_reviews.text: If you need to adjust the picture so it fits your screen, this is probably not the projector you need to buy. There is a zoom function and an all important digital zoom to control the picture size. However, there is a glitz that causes the projector to default back to factory settings each time you turn on the projector. Obviously, this causes the user to reset the screen size each time you turn it on. If I had known, I would have chosen a different unit to purchase. After contacting their tech folks, we were told they are aware of the issue, but have no plans for a fix.
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: Great short throw gaming projector!
customer_reviews.text: The short throw distance made setup a breeze. I put this on my coffee table in the living room and it gave me 100” from less than 5’ away. This projector is bright, and the color is amazing. It also has this 3X fast input feature built-in for fast action games. I tried street fighter on my PS4 and felt really responsive with no lag at all. I highly recommend this projector for gaming and movies.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Not a huge step up from PX700HD
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a comparison between the PX700HD and the PX701HD since there wasn't any literature about the differences between the two. Turns out, there aren't many that matter. This appears to be the 2019 version compared to the 2018 PX700HD. It is smaller, lighter, has a different bulb, dropped support for USB mini (weird), has vertical shift, a 10W speaker (not very good), and apparently a computer controlled color tuner (that is not a very good app at all). Besides that the picture is identical. To me, unless you are looking for smaller and newer, just stick with the 700HD. Its still a nice projector though.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent projector... recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase of this. Did my homework, read a bunch of reviews and looked at different projectors. This one clearly seems to have the most bang for the buck. Great brightness. Good bulb life. And lots of different inputs for every type of video you might need. Short throw distance allowed me to mount this very close to the ceiling and out of the way of fixtures making the installation very clean and efficient. I am using this to throw a 12 foot diagonal display and it works great. My only criticism is there isn't a side-to-side adjustment, so you basically have to center the projector on the horizontal axis of the area you're projecting to.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Pennington

customer_reviews.title: No horizontal Keystone
customer_reviews.text: Brightness and picture quality are okay. However what really makes this projector near useless is the fact it has no ability to perform horizontal keystone correction. This is a very basic and extremely important feature for any projector. If the projector can't be exactly centered on your projecting surface, Keystone is what corrects the throw distortion. Nearly all projectors have this ability because it's a basic necessity. This projector however does NOT.
customer_reviews.author: KesDl

customer_reviews.title: Great projector, easy setup, and 3d works!
customer_reviews.text: I mainly bought this project because I wanted a short throw projector, with full 1080p (not 4k). I have a 100" screen and the projector is about 5' from the screen. This projector has a very nice, clear, crisp, and bright picture. The fan isn't very noisy either. We use this too watch about 80% of all our entertainment. (DVD and streaming) This has also worked out great for 3D. Although I've had this project for about 1 year, I just bought 3D glasses and a couple movies. This project IS equipped with DLP-link so any DLP-Link active glasses will work. I bought these:  Loving this projector!!
customer_reviews.author: Bradly-James

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best projector for this price point.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. It looks in focus from corner to corner. I absolutely love the hidden compartments which houses my Roku Stick, which basically makes this a smart tv. The low latency option worked great for video games. Just remember you have to toggle it on. If I had to be picky, it would be to say that the blacks aren't AS black as I had hoped for. But other than that, the color looks fantastic once you find the settings which look most natural.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a game room!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality of this projector. It went way beyond what I was expecting. I connected a ps4 pro and a roku to it and both work well together. Playing the new call of duty mw on it, so awesome. Game play is spot on. Watching shows, movies, and sports are great. I have it set up in a room that is about 13 feet away from the wall, the projector hangs from the ceiling. The screen size is 135 inches with no projector screen. Not much fan noise easily washes out with the volume of what you are watching.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The picture is acceptable. I replaced my broken Mitsubishi with this projector. It is difficult to tell the difference because the other one was on an old bulb. But, this one is missing some critical adjustments like the shift point adjustment for a mounting that is not 100% centered is not available. I knew this before I purchased so I can't really fault the projector, I just didn't realize how important that adjustment is because it skews the picture to the point where it is not square (not as a shape, but where each side is square with the adjacent side). Otherwise, this is a good value projector that I hope last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR GAMING!
customer_reviews.text: For gaming or animation, this projector is freaking AWESOME! The picture, colors, and brightness are really great, and I have zero lag on any online games where it is crucial. Although there are better projectors for movies, this one still serves the purpose very nicely. It also still has a clear picture even when there is light in the room with sunlight coming though the windows. All in all, really great buy for $700 for both gaming and movies in one. I also recommend a 120" screen to go with it. Beware: you will never want to downsize after this.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Never again.
customer_reviews.text: I dont know why the reviews for two different models are together. This review is for the Viewsonic PJD7828HDL which is the white colored projector. Calibration is very limited. You cannot adjust the sharpness and other critical picture settings when using HDMI input. The HDMI/HML port cuts in and out every few minutes. Very dissapointed because of the pricepoint with these limited features. I just returned a lower end projector due to poor overall quality and picked this one up thinking it was superior. I was wrong. The picture is about the same as the low end projectors but at 3 times the price. Shouldve went with an Epson or Optoma at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Monztroo

customer_reviews.title: Image is crisp and bright. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great projector! The image is crisp and bright when watching in the dark. Can see the screen pretty well even when sunny out (although not ideal). I haven't noticed the rainbow effect others have mentioned. Seems to be a standard thing with DLPs in rooms with direct sunlight... I'm planning on getting blackout curtains. It was very easy to set up. My only complaint is that the fan gets pretty loud. Granted, I have it set to "high altitude" which makes the fan run faster (to compensate for thinner air above 1500 meters and avoid overheating). With high altitude turned off, I can still hear the fan if I'm thinking about it, but it is not nearly as loud.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent budget projector. Blacks not inky.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this projector for a backyard movie night. It will project a high quality clear image, with clear focus corner to corner. Zero motion blur. No noticeable rainbow effects. Whites are white. Fan is super quiet. Very bright, but wait 30 minutes past sundown if using outdoors. Colors are very vivid. Black levels are iffy, so I wouldn't recommend for a top caliber home theater. Light and very portable. If you're looking for a budget projector, this is an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: BWL

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality for outdoor rear projection
customer_reviews.text: Performed even better than expected. Was looking for a projector for outdoor movie viewing that also allowed for rear projection and great color. Love being able to plug a Roku stick directly into the projector and power it if necessary. In this case I wanted to be able to connect the projector to outdoor speakers through an HDMI cable and this worked perfectly. Strong colors and high light output worked well for rear projection using appropriate screen outdoors. The short throw angles were perfect to allow me to project from inside the pool house to the projector screen hanging through the doors. Huge picture from less than 15 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic machine, absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Viewsonic after experimenting with a cheap ($120) LCD projector that I ultimately returned. The Viewsonic is 10 times the machine the cheap one was. It has great DLP clarity and focus, pretty good sound on its own, it's excellent in various lighting situations, and is super quiet. Was very easy to hook a Roku up to and pair with a 100 inch screen in the garage/studio for family movie night. Everyone in the family is very pleased with this new addition to our home, and I'm so glad I pulled the trigger on this Viewsonic (which I chose over Epson and BenQ based on sound inputs and simplicity). This unit also looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Mom

customer_reviews.title: Price + Quality 👌🏼
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to setup and get going. Great beginning projector. This was my first and was pretty simple to setup. Only hard part was about it was any tech questions or support was hard getting ahold of the company, also every time I turn on the projector the image had to be resized and that it doesn’t save the setting, the built in speaker is terrible I will also add. Other then that picture quality is pretty good (finding that perfect focus point really matters), fan isn’t too noisy and really easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: parker

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, with good blacks and plenty of detailed settings
customer_reviews.text: This projector seems pretty solid so far, as someone who generally is skeptical of projectors I can say this one exceeded by expectations. The throw distance is perfect, 8 feet back gets you about a 100 inch picture. It is quite bright, brighter than I had expected. The blacks are really surprisingly good, the projector pretty much looks to be off in the dark patches. The input latency seems fantastic, I am going to test that more extensively and potentially update this if my findings say otherwise. I pitted this projector against a few year old $1700 projector and it seemed a bit brighter, better throw and better blacks, so definitely a good deal for the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Picture when you can get it
customer_reviews.text: We had problems with this projector from the beginning. The picture is clear but it freezes every 10 to 15 minutes. Originally we thought it was the transmitter we connected to the machine but when we connected directly to the machine with a quality hdmi chord it still froze. I would not purchase this machine again. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: ahbbzbmqbrf

customer_reviews.title: Best Gaming Projector I've Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: I have had four projectors over the last five years, two Epson, one Optoma and this Viewsonic. This projector is absolutely incredible for gaming, whether Xbox, PS3, Wii, PS4 or even PC. Nothing else has even come close. I have compared side by side to my LG OLED TV and it's nearly the same quality image while four times the size. Sure, the Epson is a better movie projector, but that is about 1% of my usage. I can't believe how amazing gaming looks on this thing. I run the image thru a Darbee and the result is astounding. A great bridge until 4K HDR projectors becomes viable and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: MaryBeth Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today and it's absolutely awesome. The kids love it, easy to hook up, vibrant colors, quiet fan. I plan on using indoor and outdoor. I haven't tried outdoor, but the color and clarity is even good in light.
customer_reviews.author: James Cannonie

customer_reviews.title: Works well even in low light...
customer_reviews.text: I project this unit onto a Silver Screen 120" at approx 11 feet. Bought it for my father who has Mac D and extremely sight impaired. The unit works very well, even in low/moderate ambient light. I have not seen it in total darkness but imagine it explodes onto the screen. As my father can now watch sports he is well satisfied. I believe this unit to be a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: M.Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Totally satisfied for my purposes.
customer_reviews.text: No issues so far. I use this as a projector for my basement media computer. Nothing like 'wall computing'! Kodi movies display well. I had this on my wish list for a while and grabbed it one day when there was a price drop. Easy to set up and get working. I run it with a small HDMI video selector that I toggle back and forth from my Xbox with.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Bob Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector for Small Room
customer_reviews.text: At 10 feet this thing throws a nice 120 inch screen. I was considering buying a 75 inch TV or this...so glad I went with this...you really fee like you're at the theater. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: BMP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Class Projector
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our organization's classroom sessions, to supplement the older units installed on the ceiling. It proved to be a great choice! Bright, Full HD, and portable. I do wish the elevation leg could be adjusted from above, but that is a ridiculously small quibble. And, the price is right...
customer_reviews.author: J Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great projector!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. Video quality is great, the built in speaker is surprisingly good. Brightness is very good. First projector so I can't compare to anything else. Ive been using it exclusively outdoors, it needs to be fairly dark out. Image is very faint before sunset, and progressively gets better and better after sunset, 1/2 hr after sunset is perfect. Im using a 20 ft inflatable screen and the image quality is phenomenal. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Nordstrom

customer_reviews.title: Review Update
customer_reviews.text: ViewSonic finally made good on their guarantee. The first unit (refurbished) they sent repeatedly and arbitrarily defaulted to a pink or green screen. Notified of this problem, ViewSonic requested evidence. As problems arose during presentations, they apparently expected I would further interrupt presentation, ask audience members to snap pictures of discolored projection, then send pictures to me. Eventually, someone at ViewSonic, realizing what they were asking, agreed to replace the unit. Although it took them over three weeks to send a replacement after we shipped the defective projector to them. All has been good for past couple of months. ~
customer_reviews.author: Dan Nygaard

customer_reviews.title: Viewsonic PJD7828HDL
customer_reviews.text: Really nice projector. I had bought an Optoma HD142X but returned it because it came defective out of the box with a very high fan noise. I bought this one to replace my investment and boy what was I thinking that I did not get this one from the get go. This projector is really bright while projecting very detailed images (this is one thing the Optoma while bright as well was not focused all across the projected image). The 3D is very good via dlp link glasses and the color reproduction works great out of the box. Very happy with this projector.
customer_reviews.author: Juan M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice home projector.
customer_reviews.text: Great projector for the price. Nicely packaged with no damage when I received it. Very easy to set up. I am using a 100” screen and it fills it perfectly at about 10’-11’. I went with the higher lumen ViewSonic home projector so the lights could be on and still see it - it is awesome quality when the lights are on. Speakers are pretty loud but nicer to get a Bluetooth extender and sound bar/speakers. Although, I wish the projector had Bluetooth built in:/ Nice product. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: It has been nothing but awesome. For the price it is very bright and ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for about a month now as my primary monitor in my home entertainment system. It has been nothing but awesome. For the price it is very bright and the resolution is great.
customer_reviews.author: BuSB

customer_reviews.title: Great for the small amount of time that it lasts
customer_reviews.text: My first one of these had a bad pixel, so I returned it and got another. The new one came in April. As of August, my projector started to overheating and turn off unless I regularly cleaned it. Picture is great! Overall it works well for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Grant Peterson

customer_reviews.title: but the picture and sound was excellent. It does get hot
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this because I needed a shorter throw, but the picture and sound was excellent. It does get hot, hotter than the Optoma I have now. Someone needs to proofread the menu and warning text. The mistakes really cheapen it, maybe it’s just me.
customer_reviews.author: John Nava

customer_reviews.title: Good for my first home theater
customer_reviews.text: Good projector, perfect short throw.. remote could have better functionality. Good for small home theater for the price
customer_reviews.author: M Gup

customer_reviews.title: good projector
customer_reviews.text: using this for movies outside and it works great. plenty bright if used in the evening when the sun is going down.
customer_reviews.author: maheshwari15

customer_reviews.title: Good Projector for the money
customer_reviews.text: This projector has a great picture quality and decent audio. I deducted 1 star because it does not have the freeze screen function that its older version did have. That upset a few teachers where I installed these.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Spetter

customer_reviews.title: Short throw projector good for smaller rooms
customer_reviews.text: Very good projector. The 1080p looks great on my 100 inch screen. I have it about 6 feet away from the screen because it is a short throw projector. It's great for a smaller room. I did a lot of research and chose this over the optoma short throw because it did not have a manual zoom. Also ViewSonic has a 3 year warranty on parts and one year on the bulb. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: beningo

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the money
customer_reviews.text: If you are a beginner as I am or on a budget as I am this is a dang good product, I would say keep the projector closer to the spectrum given as I maxed mine out on my 110 screen and mathematically put it as far away as I could. Turned out great for me but I have the lens as open as it goes and as focused as it gets soooo im lucky I’m good at math or it would have really pissed me off lol so just put it a foot closer than you think just to be safe and avoid a blurry picture
customer_reviews.author: Griffin Wayne Wangen

customer_reviews.title: This is a really great projector for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great projector for the price. I've had no problems at all since I bought it several months ago. I bought this mainly for outdoor movie nights. The picture is bright, crisp, and the color is great for both indoor and outdoor use, even if you start projecting at dusk (of course, it's even better later in the night).
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Juan

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Quite surprised at how nice this projector is. I also have a high end projector for my media room and for the price, this one is a steal. This model is the basic model - no digital zoom or horizontal keystone. Serves my purpose for an outdoor projector. It's nice and bright and the speaker was an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: GreatAcorn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great all around projector. Buy it you will be happy. This is for the PJD7828DHL Only
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Downs

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Very bright compared to the 10yr old Viewsonic it replaced! Worked well for watching a movie at after dusk in the backyard!
customer_reviews.author: Aircraft800

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this projector! We use it daily as our main TV projecting on a 108" screen. We keep it on Eco and the image is still bright and crisp! Much better than our previous projector - we plant to have this one for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob White

customer_reviews.title: Best projector ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This projector is amazing!! The picture quality is sharp, bright, and huge!! You can adjust the size of the picture to fit your wall. It feels like you are at the movies, except in the comfort of your living room. Beautiful picture.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far.. Short throw not as short as I thought..U may have to move further back...
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Bright Projector
customer_reviews.text: After doing many hours of research I decided to this projector. I can't say enough about it. I'm not using it for gaming but for watching TV/Movies. The picture is beautiful and bright, even during the day time. I also purchased a Elite Screen Electric100H. What a wonderful combination. Mounting it only 5' in distance from the screen gives me a perfect 100' diagonal image. You can't go wrong with this projector and the price is very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Purchased Feb 2019 and Pixels are already going out
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Feb 2019, and now the pixels are going out. Purchased a Square Trade plan for 4 years of coverage, and that's a joke. Getting sick and tired of the Amazon customer service run around.
customer_reviews.author: CP DESIGNSTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: This projector lasts
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this projector for a year and a half, use it almost everyday and it’s still bright and sharp. The only downside is, going to see a movie in the theater isn’t as special as it used to be now that we have our own big screen at home. So luxurious!
customer_reviews.author: lindens dad

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The project was bright and playback of video was incredibly smooth. With USB-C port, I was able to connect my iPad and MacBook with ease as well as charge my devices at the same time. The image is huge and perfect for my needs when considering a short throw projector.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: White screen transitions cause light to spill over screen into wall.
customer_reviews.text: Brightness is good. However on white screen transitions the keystone is exposed and you can see light on the wall which is distracting. Otherwise picture quality would be given a higher rating. A bonus ViewSonic feature is the letterbox format for buyers that have letterbox screens.
customer_reviews.author: PixelPlus

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Very good picture quality for the price paid. The projector works as expected, and easily adjustable for different room environments, and projection surface. So far no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Merdin H.

customer_reviews.title: Does not remember your preferred Zoom setting
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about it: You have to reset the size you prefer each and every time you turn it on, and also each and every time you switch to a different media source. It does not remember your preferred screen size setting (zoom setting).
customer_reviews.author: Altruist

customer_reviews.title: Wow Factor small price big picture
customer_reviews.text: Let me say this, WOW. This is a great short throw projector. I can’t believe the picture quality. I had the gtdarbee and let me tell you this is hands down the same quality for $100 cheaper. Don’t think and just buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic projector. I did a fair amount of research ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic projector. I did a fair amount of research and was looking for something affordable that was bright and clear. This is perfect for our needs. We mounted it on the ceiling in a fairly small downstairs family room (13' across) and the picture is great, the size adjustments are very easy to use, it is extremely bright. The fan is a bit noisy, but not bad at all. The included speakers aren't bad at all. I couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nickolas

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best deals I found online
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best deals I found online. Compared to others like EPSON, SAMSUNG, ASUS, this one was the best deal with better features and price! Customer services support was very helpful online from ViewSonic website and helped me to set it up !
customer_reviews.author: Julius Z

customer_reviews.title: no V- keystone adjustments
customer_reviews.text: limited adjustment, no rear height adjustment, no V keystone adjustments, no corner adjustments.....basically you can get the Epson 2100 refurbished for less with way more adjustments. The only redeeming factor for this unit is that it is brighter....but for most condition....it wont make a difference
customer_reviews.author: Philip Chu

customer_reviews.title: White dots all over after minimal use!
customer_reviews.text: If you want a projector that will last more than couple hundred hours, do not buy this. White dots spreading across the screen and it’s barely been 2 years of intermittent use.
customer_reviews.author: Spaz

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I've used it a few times but so far the 1080p looks awesome. Watched Sunday night football and HD movie and it looked really good. I got the rainbow effect the first time I used it but after that it was less noticeable. Easy to use but some of the options seem to not work. The instruction disk doesn't work. But overall happy with it at a decent value.
customer_reviews.author: danny951

customer_reviews.title: So Glad I Bought This One
customer_reviews.text: This projector is just perfect for our backyard theater. It is super bright. It is easy to set up and focus. The speaker is loud enough for inside use and easily covers the little bit of fan noise. Blu-ray movies look amazing on my ten foot screen.
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Spent tons of time looking at different ones. Super nice!
customer_reviews.author: bradyj87

customer_reviews.title: Excellent projector with a great price point
customer_reviews.text: Short and sweet... it lacks a lot of the higher end functions you would get in more expensive models but more then enough to be functional. For the prices the quality of this device is really good. Its performance in ambient light situations is very good making it usable at any time of the day. At night it delivers excellent entertainment quality. only down side is no horizontal pin cushion settings so you really do need to be able to put this device middle front or back of the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ) and ordered this one and we're so glad we did
customer_reviews.text: We returned a less expensive, off-brand projector (with a loud fan!) and ordered this one and we're so glad we did! My husband mounted it in our theater room and the picture (in hdmi) is great! ViewSonic is a well-respected brand so I don't anticipate any problems with it or with customer service.

customer_reviews.title: The remote controller can be used as a mouse only ...
customer_reviews.text: The remote controller can be used as a mouse only when the projector is connected to a computer via D-sub. I need this feature for a HDMI connection as well.

customer_reviews.text: Setting up the projector was easy. Image was clear and switches between inputs easily. Only draw back is one hdmi slot is easily accessible and the other one you have to remove a cover which has a very small screw.

customer_reviews.title: Short Throw means Short Throw, be prepared to have it in front of you.
customer_reviews.text: It works really well, though the throw assumes that it has to be placed between the optimal distance of viewing and the projector screen - IE in front of you. Just be prepared to set up something in front of you that is either floor or in my case, wall mounted.

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this projector. It’s bright and clear. Only problem was finding a mount that would work with it. In the end, I modified a universal mount and it works really well.
